data.market_trends: An uptick in solo and off-the-beaten-path travel, with more travelers willing to explore lesser-known areas within Guatemala, enhancing its draw as an adventurous destination.
data.consumer_behavior: Travelers tend to research extensively online, relying on social media and blogs to guide their choices, favoring personalized travel experiences.
data.competitive_landscape: Key competitors include Belize and Costa Rica, both known for similar eco-tourism draws, making it imperative for Guatemala to highlight unique cultural aspects and natural beauty.
data.seasonal_factors: Peak travel times align with North American winter months when travelers seek warmer climates, while the summer sees an influx of family travelers during school breaks.
